#summary Describes how to add custom banner sizes.

= Custom Sizes =

You can change predefined banner sizes in the file server/src/main/app.properties You need to recompile the project after that.

If you already started to use ASB MyAds you can change the sizes in the deployed application by editing app.properties within WEB-INF/lib/myads.jar archive. Don't forget to restart Tomcat.

Ad formats have the following format: 
ad_format.width_height=id

For example:
ad_format.300_600=18

See the list of existing formats, choose the next available id and set your custom width x height for an ad format.
